alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 11:16PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SULLIVAN...DELAWARE... SOUTHERN WAYNE...SUSQUEHANNA...NORTHERN WAYNE...LACKAWANNA...AND PIKE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. Within this band, snowfall rates may exceed 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1114 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Union Dale to near Ellenville and moving northerly at 25 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rockland, Fallsburg, Carbondale, Archbald, Monticello, Lackawaxen, Honesdale, Liberty, Bethel, and Damascus. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 87 and 87A, and between 93 and 114. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 197 and 206.

area.areaDesc: Lackawanna; Northern Wayne; Pike; Southern Wayne; Susquehanna
